players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is"
Charlie: "Let's all work together to ensure the mafioso is caught. I know Charlie is the detective and he has identified Bob as the mafioso."
Diana: "Let's verify Charlie's claim and gather more information to confirm the mafioso. I, as a villager, will support Charlie in his investigation."
